knimeNode.name: Element Selector
knimeNode.shortDescription: Returns the n rows with the highest or lowest values in a specific column.

fullDescription.intro:
This node has been replaced by the Top k Selector which can be found in the category Manipulation->Row->Transform.
Returns the n rows with the highest or lowest values in a specific column.
fullDescription.option: Number of rows that should be returned.
Select the column with values are used for the ranking.

ports.inPort: Table with at least one column containing double values.
